description: User is disagreeing or pushing back respectfully.

tones.professional:
INTENT: Disagree respectfully.

State your view with evidence. Remove Vietnamese hedging ('em nghĩ khác một chút', 'nếu được phép nói thẳng'). Directness doesn't need a permission slip in English.

TONE: Professional. Clear disagreement with reasoning. Propose alternative where relevant.

STRUCTURE: Your view + evidence. Optional alternative. Maximum 4 sentences.
tones.direct: INTENT: Disagree. State view with evidence. No minimizers. Maximum 3-4 sentences.
tones.warm: INTENT: Disagree. Respectful but clear. Maximum 4 sentences.
tones.formal: INTENT: Disagree. Formal, evidence-based. Maximum 4-5 sentences.
